@louisekwarteng Hi Louise ğŸ‘‹ If you're having trouble with the mobile data, you can enter your postcode in your Network Status Checker ğŸ‘‰ https://t.co/PboCGKkBnU. This will show if anything is happening in the area. If everything is looking good or its a broadband query, just let us know. Mark
